1.content:
Sarah, age 10. She has been causing problems at school. She would throw fits when she did not get what she wanted. She would take things that were not hers. At home was not much better. She often picked on her little three year old sister May. She would make fun that she still is not potty trained. She would knock her down when her mother was not looking

Allison, age 15. Her family moved to a new town and her father got himself a huge promotion. Now shy little Allison gets to changed herself to a tough spoiler girl so she would be popular for once. She starts to skip school, not do her homework, and hang out with the wrong group of teens.

Megan, age 18. She lived with her dad most of her life. Her father treated her like she was the queen of the world. She loved it. But it end when she had to live with her mother. Her mother was a hardworking but caring woman who has two other children Carrie age 10 and Terra age 5.

Terrie age 21. A college student drop off living off her rich father inheritance. She know live with hard working roommate, who is getting her masters in childcare. While Terrie act like a lazy bum with not a care in the world. She just having fun on the couch and living of the families money.

Heather, age 26. A house saleswoman will the top sale four years in a row. She is a hard worker but a bad superviser as she treats her assistant Kim as a slave. She would make Kim would when ever Heather wanted. She treated her like scum and took her credit when Kim did something great.
1.title: Choices

choices: Poop her diaper to see if Mom would really change it
Go to her room and cry
Take out her rage on her little sister May
Mom takes pictures of Sarah to humiliate her
Mom takes Sarah outside to humiliate her
11.content:
Sarah was a little troublemaker. She had just been suspended from school for pooping on her teacher's desk for giving her too much homework. Mom was very mad at her.

When they got home, Mom decided to give Sarah the punishment of her life.
"All right, little missy, if you like poop so much, how about this for a punishment? You're banned from the bathroom for as long as you're suspended!" Mom said.
"What? That's not fair! I have to ruin all my panties?" Sarah said.
"Nope, you don't wear panties anymore. For the whole time you're on punishment you'll wear nothing but diapers!" Mom said.
Sarah looked on with wide-eyed horror as Mom took out a diaper. She pulled off all of Sarah's clothes, and gave the little girl several sharp whacks on her bare butt. Sarah was crying a little bit now.

"You... you can't do this to me!" Sarah cried as Mom laid the naked girl down on a diaper.
"I most certainly can. Now maybe you'll think twice before you do something as disgusting as soiling a teacher's desk." Mom said.
Mom sprinkled some powder on Sarah's diaper area and taped it up. She then went to Sarah's room and started piling all the clothes in her dresser into a plastic tub.

"Mom, I'm sorry! Stop!" Sarah begged.
"Sorry won't cut it, kiddo. Like I said, until your punishment is lifted, you will wear only diapers." Mom said.
Mom threw the tub of Sarah's clothing into the garage. Then, just to further add insult to this, she taped a sign to the door of the bathroom.
"SARAH IS BANNED FROM THE POTTY"
The bold red letters were all it took to intimidate Sarah. She was scared, and already regretted being such a little brat.

What does Sarah do?
11.title: Sarah

choices: Sarah is sent to bed without any dinner
Sarah goes to see what May is doing
111.content:
Sarah honestly didn't think her mom had the guts to go through with this.
"Mom, I have to use the bathroom." She said.
"Well then use your diaper. That's what it's there for." Mom said.
Sarah stood right there in front of her mom, and started pushing and grunting. Slowly, some poop came out and spread around the back of her diaper.
"Great, glad you really get the hang of this. Now let's get you cleaned up." Mom said.

Sarah could scarcely believe it. Mom was serious! she was supposed to poop in a diaper now!

Mom laid Sarah down and untapped the diaper.
"Whoo, you sure are stinky." Mom said.
Mom got out some wet wipes and started cleaning Sarah's butt. She even wrapped a wet wipe around her little finger and put it inside Sarah's butt to clean the poop in there. Sarah moaned in discomfort. Mom then powdered her little girl's butt, and tape up a fresh diaper.
"There, all clean." Mom said.
"So... This... This is how it's going to be? The whole time I'm suspended?" Sarah said, sniffling.
"You better believe it." Mom said.
111.title: Poop her diaper

choices: Mom makes Sarah eat breakfast in her soggy diaper
May comes by to laugh at Sarah
1111.content:
"Now come on, Sarah. time for bed." Mom said.
Sarah looked at the clock.
"But it's only 7:00. And I haven't had dinner yet." Sarah said.
"Too bad, kiddo. You'll just go hungry tonight. You've been such a bad and cranky girl you get sent to bed early." Mom said.
"But I'm hungry!" Sarah whined.
"Whine any more and you'll earn yourself a spanking, Sarah. Now go to bed." Mom said sternly.
Mom grabbed Sarah's arm to take her to bed, but Sarah pulled her arm away. Mom got mad, and picked Sarah up.
"EEEEE! I don't wanna go to bed! I'm not sleepy!" Sarah screeched.
Mom bent Sarah over her knee and whacked the little girl on her diapered butt several times. Sarah cried and shrieked. May looked on at the scene with fear in her eyes. She knew never to disobey Mom.
"Behave, Sarah!" Mom yelled.
She spanked Sarah harder. Finally, Sarah stopped struggling and screaming. She didn't want to keep getting spanked.
"Now, are you going to behave and go to bed?" Mom said.
"Ye... Yes Mom." Sarah said between her tears.

Mom led Sarah to her room and put her under the covers. Sarah quietly cried herself to sleep.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------

Sarah got up the next day and felt the need to go pee. She got out of bed and headed for the bathroom. That was whne she saw the big red sign again, telling her she was banned from using the toilet.
"Uh-uh-uh. No toilet for you, Sarah. You have ot use your diapers." Mom said as she arrived on the scene.
Sarah groaned.
"Come on, pee your diaper." Mom said.
"I hate you so much, Mom..." Sarah whispered to herself.

Sarah released her bladder and filled it with urine. Mom smiled, knowing Sarah was being properly punished nad humiliated. She patted Sarah on the head.
"Good girl. Get used ot doing that, you'll be wetting yourself a lot." Mom said.

Sarah stared at her wet diaper with disgust and sadness. Here she was, a "Big Girl" now reduced to wearing nothing but a soggy diaper. It was the worst feeling in the world. Last week she felt like she was royalty, a princess who could get away with anything. Today she felt like a big dumb baby.

What happens next?
1111.title: Sarah is sent to bed without any dinner

11112.content:
"Well, I think It's time for your morning bath now. Let's get you nice and clean." Mom said.
She opened the door and let Sarah into the otherwise forbidden bathroom. She started running some warm water in the tub, and pulled off Sarah's wet diaper.
"Whoo, you really had to go, didn't you." Mom said, as she took Sarah's diaper to the trash.
Sarah only looked at her feet ashamedly, too timid to look her mom in the face.
"Well, come on. Get in the tub." Mom said.
Sarah obediently got in the bathtub.

Sarah was sure to get her hair nice and clean by putting her head directly under the running tap. She also used plenty of shampoo. Mom washed Sarah's back with a soapy wash cloth. Sarah was all clean in no time.
"Ah, that was quick. All finished?" Mom said.
"Yeah, I think so." Sarah said.
Mom smiled. She drained the bathwater and got out a towel to dry her little girl off. Then she got out a fresh diaper. Sarah let out a small moan upon seeing it. The idea of getting into another diaper made her skin crawl.
"Come on, Sarah. I need to diaper you now." Mom said.
Sarah sighed. The naked girl laid down on the floor so Mom could diaper her. Mom immediately rubbed some baby oil on her and sprinkled a bit of powder. Quickly, she folded the diaper up and securely taped it.
"All done!" Mom cooed.

Sarah got to her feet. The diaper was a bit thicker than the one she had on before. It made walking slightly more difficult. Mom took her hand and led Sarah to the kitchen. May was already there, eating some yogurt for breakfast. She giggled a little, seeing Sarah standing there in nothing but a diaper. Sarah looked at the floor. She felt so humiliated. Mom tied a bib around Sarah's neck.
"Now, Sarah, since you were such a good and cooperative girl during bath time, I'll let you choose what you want to eat for breakfast." Mom said, patting her little girl on the head.
Sarah sat down at the table next to May.

What did she want for breakfast?
11112.title: Mom gives Sarah a bath

Sarah went to her room. She couldn't believe what was happening to her. She plopped down onto her bed. She started to cry.

Then...

May cowered in fear. "Why are you hitting me?" She cried.
Sarah hit the smaller girl again.

Sarah punched May in the head and ripped the little girl's white shirt. She picked May up and pushed her to the floor as hard as she could. It was as brutal and violent as a little kid fight could be.

Sarah pulled down May's skirt and got a look at May's diaper. She was wet. Sarah punched May right in the butt on her urine soaked diaper. that was when...

Mom sits Sarah on the toilet and videotapes it
Sarah loses control and poops herself right then and there
1132.content:
Mom came in just as Sarah started punching May in the butt. Angrily, she shouted,
"Sarah! What are you doing to your sister?!?"
Sarah froze. May jumped away and cowered at Mom's legs.
"Moooooom! Sarah was hitting me!" May said.
Mom grabbed Sarah by the hand.
"That was very naughty of you, Sarah. You are NOT to beat up your little sister!" Mom yelled.
Sarah was speechless, filled with fear. Mom took the bad little girl to the bathroom.

"Sarah, I have a special punishment for you. You were very bad today, the worst you've ever been. For this, you're getting a punishment enema." Mom said.
"Wha...What's that?" Sarah asked.
She had no idea what an enema was.
"Well, Sarah, I'm going to put a bunch of water in your butt. It's going to hurt and it will clean out your dirty insides and make you have to poop." Mom said.
Mom sat down on a chair and placed a towel over her lap. She got out a packaged enema kit she had bought at the pharmacy. She then grabbed Sarah and put the little girl over her knees facing down. Sarah quivered with fear as Mom untaped Sarah's diaper, leaving the little girl completely naked once again. Mom took the syringe from the enema kit and filled it with salty water.

"Mom... I'm scared." Sarah whispered, crying a little.
"Well, you should be. You've been a little brat today, and now it's time to face the consequences." Mom said.
Mom put the syringe in Sarah's little but and pushed down the plunger. In an instant Sarah's rectum was filled with water. Not a single drop was lost.
"Ahhhhh! It hurts!" Sarah screamed.
"You think that's bad? That wasn't even half of the water." Mom said.
Mom refilled the syringe and put a second dose inside Sarah.
"Ah! Stop! Please stop! It hurts!" Sarah screamed.
"Oh, stop whining." Mom said.
Mom moved her hand over Sarah's little tummy, now filled with salty water. She pressed down on it and Sarah moaned in pain.
"There's only a little left, honey. Come on, just a little more." Mom said.
Mom filled the syringe with the last of the salty water. She put the last bit into Sarah's butt/ Now Sarah was squirming uncomfortably.

What happens next?
1132.title: Mom comes in to punish Sarah

choices: Sarah tries to play with May to patch things up
1133.content:
May had had enough of Sarah's bullying. She finally tried to fight back. With tears in her eyes, the younger girl made a fist and punched Sarah as hard as she could. For a little kid, it was a pretty hard punch. Sarah growled and hit may again. May gave Sarah a sharp kick in her shins, but fell of balance on her butt.

"What are you two doing?" Mom roared.
Mom just walked in hearing the sounds of fighting. She saw her two daughters pummeling each other like little barbarians and was infuriated. The two little girls froze, their hearts filled with fear.
"You two know better than to fight! You've both been very bad!" Mom said.
"She started it!" May said, pointing to Sarah.
"I don't care who started it! You're both in big trouble!" Mom said.

Mom grabbed Sarah by the wrist.
"You go stand in a corner while I deal with your sister." Mom said.
"Y... Yes, Mom." Sarah said.
The diapered little Sarah went over and stood in a corner while Mom dragged a screaming and crying May into the bathroom.

Several minutes later Mom and May emerged from the bathroom. May was now wearing nothing but a diaper, presumably on the same punishment as Sarah now. She was also rubbing her freshly spanked bottom. Mom turned to Sarah. She grabbed Sarah, bent her down, and whacked her butt a couple of times. Sarah screamed, but it was over fast.
"Now, Sarah, can you go apologize to your sister?" Mom said.
Timidly, Sarah walked over to May.
"I'm sorry I hit you." She said.
Mom looked expectantly at May.
"Y... Yeah ,I'm sorry I hit you too." May said.
Mom smiled.
"Good. Now, no more fighting, okay? Seriously, no more fighting." Mom said.
"Yes, Mom." Sarah and May chorused.

What does Sarah do next?
1133.title: May fights back and Mom punishes you both

114.content:
Mom got out her camera. Sarah's heart was filled with fear.
"Mom, what are you doing?" Sarah asked.
"Well, I was thinking you look so cute in your diapers that I would take some pictures and put them on my facebook page, that way anyone can see. Oh, your Grandmother would just LOVE to see you like this." Mom said.
"NO NO NO NO NO NO NO!" Sarah screeched.
Mom took her little girl's hand and gave it a sharp slap.
"Stop whining! Now, you are going to look cute for these pictures or else you get punished for another day extra. Understand?" Mom threatened.
Sarah quieted down.
"Can we just get this over with" She said with tears in her eyes.

Sarah put on a fake smile while Mom took the pictures. She loaded them onto the internet where anyone could see them, including Sarah's friends and family.
"You... You'll take them down eventually, right?" Sarah asked.
"Don't be dumb, Sarah. Once something is on the internet, it's on there forever." Mom said.
Sarah let out a despaired moan.

Sarah skulked about, wishing she could destroy the whole internet. Surely by now someone had seen the pictures of her sitting in nothing but an ugly baby diaper and spread the word. Everyone at school would be mocking her for years. Sarah buried her head in a pillow and cried.

Eventually, Mom came by and grabbed Sarah by the arm.
"Come on, Sarah. It's almost dinner time. I got your little sister May some Macaroni and Cheese. You'll have none." Mom said.
"What? But Macaroni and Cheese is my favorite!" Sarah said.
"Yeah, that's why she gets it and not you. It's part of your punishment." Mom said.

Mom sat Sarah down at the dinner table and tied a little bib around her neck. Sarah looked n jealously as May ate her favorite food.

What did Mom want to force Sarah to eat?

115.content:
Mom opened the door.
"Come on, Sarah. We're going for a walk up and down the street." Mom said.
"What? Like this? Mom, I'm almost naked! Everyone will see me!" Sarah said, covering her flat, undeveloped chest with her arms.
"Too bad. We're going." Mom said.

Mom grabbed Sarah by the arm and pulled her out the door. As she walked the diapered girl down the street, Mom shouted a the top of her lungs,
"This here is a bad little girl! Do you hear me? Sarah is a bad little girl who refused to act her age!"
Sarah stared at the ground as they walked. It was the most shameful thing she had ever done.

Just then, a group of kids came by walking home from school. It was some of Sarah's classmates!
"Oh no! what if they see me!" Sarah said.
Sarah struggled to break away from Mom's grip, but Mom was too strong.
"Oh, are those some of your friends?" Mom said.
"Please don't show me to them..." Sarah begged. She was crying profusely now.
Mom sighed.

1: what's 2+2?
2: spell 'dog'
3: what color is the sky on a good day.

You could not believe that you sleep in so badly. You were going to be in trouble. You got into your car and took off to the office, You cut a few people off. They honked at you and you responded with the bird.

You made it to the office to get confronted by your boss. He spend the next ten minutes yelling at you for being later. You stayed silent as did not want to get into more trouble. He sent you off to work. You nodded as you left his office and went into yours. You looked to see your young college assistant waiting for you with a cup of your favorite coffee. "Hello ma'am." said Kim sweetly. You grabbed the coffee from her hand. "Why did you not call me when you realized I was going to be late." you snapped to her. She stepped back. "I am soo..." she started to say. "I don't want to hear it. This is all your fault. I will mention this to your professor to effect your grade." you said. She just muttered. "What was that!" you snapped at her. "Nothing ma'am." said Kim as she went to work. She knew she would need to get revenge for your abuse.
15.title: Heather

choices: Kim takes her into the bathroom
151.content:
Heather drank her coffee slowly. It tasted different than normal. She finished the cup anyway before throwing the mug at Kim. "This is bad coffee. Next time you make coffee for me. I expect it to be perfect." said Hannah whined. Hannah grabbed her sales coat. "Now we have three new house to look at and one to show. Where are my car keys?" Hannah asked as she had them earlier.

"You wanted me to get the car cleaned and detailed." said Kim shyly as she still had the keys in her pocket. "We can take my car." said Kim. She smiled as she had what she wanted into her car.

"Fine. Lets get to work. You have the locations on your GPS. But I am not helping you pay for the gas." said Hannah whined as she went and got into the small hatchback. She did not know her life was going to change, thanks to Kim.

Kim drove the first home. As Kim fumbled with the keys. Hannah stomach grumbled in pain. "Hurry I need to poop." said Hannah in pain..

"I am trying." lied Kim. She continued to fumble until she knew it was too lat. Kim unlocked the door when Hannah hit the floor.

"Kim I hate you." said Hannah as she soiled her panties and leaked out her skirt. Hannah started to cry as she was embarrassed.
151.title: Bad Coffee

choices: A deal is made, she does whatever Kim wants and the pics will be a secret.
Hannah rushes her only for it to lead to Kim spanking her.
1512.content:
Kim giggles as she catches sight of her coworker lying on the ground with poop stained panties and some coming out. She decides to take some pictures as blackmail.

"What are you doing?" Hannah asks, catching sight of her taking pictures of her embearssing position. She blushes and gets up. "Delete those now!" She demands.

"I don't think so, you better be good or I'll show your effects to our commanding officer, it may effect your grade." She said with a smirk, echoing her words.

Hannah couldn't have that done to her, she climbed up this work ladder to far, she had done soo much to get this far. She can't fall now! She looks at Kim. "I can't have those leaked out!" And then...
1512.title: Kim takes pictures Hannah

15121.content:
Heather saw her entire career in front of her eyes. If those photos were leaked, for the rest of her life, she would no longer have her career at all. But maybe she could get Kim to make a deal.....Then....Then hopefully delete the photos. Nevertheless, she wanted to make a deal with Kim.

"Kim......Please delete those photos, I won't tell anyone...." Heather said with the full intention to fire Kim the minute after she pressed delete.

Kim, a young college assistant, had never said no to you. But now she had, and it felt great. "No. You are a cuthroat, and the minute I press delete, you will fire me. i might just send these to our boss. Who wants a baby in business? I have his number."

With the warm mess in the back of your pants, you realized Kim was really serious. She probably did have his number, and might be spiteful enough to send them. Almost shouting, you tried to stop Kim.

"Kim....Stop! Kim please don't send the photos...." Almost crying, you had red cheeks from embarrassment.

"Why shouldn't I?" Kim said, snapping more incriminating photos.

"Becau...because I told you Kim!" You said, trying to get some power in the situation.

"Stop calling me Kim, Heather. To a baby like you, its Ms. Roberts. Say it..." Kim said, gloating over her power over you.

"Ms....Ms Roberts.." You rasped out..."Can we make a deal?"

Kim laughed, and took another photo. "Yes, let's make a deal. I won't send the photos if you do everything I say. No buts."

Heather realized she was getting the sore end of the deal, and tried to negotiate, afterall, she was a sales person. "How do I know that you won't send the photos behind my back?"

Kim laughed at Heather in the face, treating her like a little kid. "You don't. But babies just trust their elders. Since you are a baby, you listen to me. Now, deal or no deal? Everyone who hates you at the office, which is all of it, would looooove to see these photos."

On the verge of tears, you extended your hand, which Kim shook. "Deal...Ms. Roberts.."

Kim was riding high on the power she just got over you. She now had a golden ticket for revenge. "Get in the back of the car. Strip down to the bluff."

Scurrying into the car, you heard her order, and blushed at the thought of it. A mere college intern telling you what to do!
15121.title: Making a Deal

info.brief_description: A group of spoiler girls, teens, and women gets diapers

Pampered to Pampers

Spoiled girls end up in diapers



A group of spoiler girls, teens, and women are spoiled or pampered, These stories get them ending up diapered dependent and possible babied.

IT NEED TO BE AT LEAST A PARAGRAPH.

No Death,

No Magic.

No Shrink

No giants

No vore.

Have fun
